title: Undertow
description: When Gabriel dives off a cliff to save Kailani, neither expected to be swept away by more than the current.In a bid to gain her independence, Kailani Kakoa traded the sunny shores of Hawaii for the mist-laden forests of Oregon. Her varsity swimming scholarship is her lifeline, and her college degree will be her ticket to freedom. She is ambitious. She is driven. She has a plan. But she didnâ€™t plan on Gabriel.Gabriel McEwen had abandoned his plan of becoming a rescue diver. But meeting Kailani ignited something in him he thought long extinguished. Tension with his father and unhealed wounds from the past keep him locked in a war with himself.Kailani is everything Gabriel has ever wanted, but the one thing he cannot have. Will they be able to resist the attraction that could put their futures at stake?
author: Kaia Knight
